text: And another angel, who had authority over the fire, came out from the altar and called out with a loud 14:18 cry 50.4% {BYZ HF 36.6%} ¦ voice NA SBL WH 8.5%cry to the angel who had the sharp sickle, “Take yoʋr sharp sickle and gather the clusters 14:18 from the vintage ¦ --- STfrom the vintage of the earth, for 14:18 its grapes 48% ¦ the grapes of the earth K ANT BYZ HF 38.6%its grapes are ripe.”
